text:
Characters such as éàè have been replaced by U+FFFD REPLACEMENT CHARACTER in french properties files in tomcat-i18n-fr.jar.

So, messages in catalina.out looks like
GRAVE: "Servlet.service()" pour la servlet Slave000 a gï¿½nï¿½rï¿½ une exception
instead of
GRAVE: "Servlet.service()" pour la servlet Slave000 a généré une exception
creator: ludovic.walle@laposte.net

text: I observe the same issue with 6.0.18 and the 6.0.19 release candidate but I can't reproduce this on my  machine. It looks like an issue with the RM's build environment. Investigations continue.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Root cause found and fixed in 6.0.x and trunk. It will be used from 6.0.20 onwards.

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text: *** Bug 47049 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
